addon:addon.name: Home Connect Direct Binding
addon:addon.description: The binding integrates the Home Connect devices into openHAB. It connects to household appliances from brands such as Bosch and Siemens. The connection is established directly to the devices.

parameter-group.name: authentication
parameter-group.label: HTTP Basic Authentication
parameter-group.description: Protect the Home Connect Web UI Console.

parameter.name: basicAuthEnabled
parameter.label: HTTP Basic Authentication
parameter.description: This configuration parameter allows you to enable or disable HTTP Basic Authentication for the console interface. When enabled, users are required to provide a username and password to access the console. If disabled, authentication will not be required, and the console will be accessible without credentials.
